description:
This course teaches MS Project from the ground up. Learn the ins and outs of all the basic functionalities. Lead up to more advanced topics for use at work or in the classroom.

Video tutorials, step by step explanations and real examples help you understand how to use MS Project, and where you can use it to help in academic, private or professional life.

8 modules (sections) each with 4 to 8 sub-sections contain roughly 5 hours of material that take you from scratch to business-level use of MS Project.

This course will help you be better organized and effective when planning anything from a family event to a corporate deliverable.
title: The Future Builder: Microsoft Project 2010 in 8 Easy Modules
